channel.title: Server shutting down
channel.description: My friend made a server, which works fine for him. But whenever i try to move it just shuts down. I can spawn items, weild equipment etc. and attack with auto-retaliate but moving just closes down the application. I have downloaded the newest versions of JDK, JSE and JSDK and his other friend used the server but it worked fine for him. Any idea what is causing it to close?

item.title: Server shutting down
item.dc:creator: @sonicforce41 sonicforce41
item.description:
@sonicforce41 wrote:

I fixed mine by Doing this. Re-install java, make when they ask you for which location, choose program files (x86) -> java and in client change program files to program files (x86).
I’ll be posting a tutorial on this When I get on my computer. Rep++ if I helped.

Read full topic

item.title: Server shutting down
item.dc:creator: @deathschaos9 DeathsChaos9
item.description:
@deathschaos9 wrote:

[quote=“NignogNiall, post:5, topic:327357”]I have windows 7.
In the file for the server if i try opening the Client it says it cannot find the file, so i think it is probably i don’t have the same client, how would i go about getting his client?[/quote]

Check your java, that error is being caused by your Java. You need the same kind of java as your OS, 32 bit or 64 bit, you have the wrong kind for your computer.

Read full topic

item.title: Server shutting down
item.dc:creator: @Hello_RSPS Hello RSPS
item.description:
@Hello_RSPS wrote:

U first need to know what name the client got, and try to search it on google for downloading.

item.title: Server shutting down
item.dc:creator: @The_Mistake The Mistake
item.description:
@The_Mistake wrote:

Your source is most likely broken. I’ve had a few like that. Send me an e-mail at: newer1@rocketmail.com, and we’ll work this out.
Thanks.
